"A.P.238/4/9/15:00": "Hey, you're back! Again, thank you for participating in the ARKS Battle Championship! There's something I want to say!"
"That amazing ending was all thanks to you! You appeared like a comet and became a star of promise! You stood out!"
"I have something to ask you, out of personal interest!"
"What drives you to become stronger? Is it for ARKS? For justice? Or is it for someone else?"
"Ah, I see, I see! It's a wonderful thing, to be a paragon of ARKS!"
"From now on, you must never forget that aspiration!"
"True power comes from a true spirit! Always follow your own path!"
"Really! Is that so! Powerful spirit, welcome to the cause!"
"Justice demands perseverance! Even if your path holds only pain and bitterness!"
"With those aspirations, I'm glad that you came to me! OK!"
"I see! So you're resolved in that! Indeed, during that battle I felt the pounding strength of your resolution!"
"\"There's something I want to protect, no matter what...\" That's the sort of resolution I saw!"
"Well, it might be misplaced, but it's good enough, as long as your intentions are true!"
"Keep ahold of that spirit, create your own path and follow it to the end! Alright!"
